original_text: The second one married the widow, but he also died, leaving no child. It was the same with the third.
korean_text: 둘째도 그 여자를 취하였다가 상속자가 없이 죽고 셋째도 그렇게 하여

sentences.original_text: The second one married the widow
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 사람은 그 과부와 결혼했으나

sentences.original_text: It was the same with the third
